Story:
   **As a** [role]  
   **I need** [function]  
   **So that** [benefit]  
   
Additional information: <br>        
   [document what you know]

Acceptance criterion: <br>
   Given [some context] <br>
   When [certain action is taken] <br>
   Then [the outcome of action is observed]
